00006 class EventPacket
00007 {  
00008 public:
00009   // ?? bytes per packet
00010   // in the list, the packet is accompanied by a next pointer, 
00011   //for  a total of 84
00012 
00013   short jstart, jstop;  
00014   // image indices in primary direction of region of support,  
00015   //jstop > jstart
00016   float secondaryStart, zStart;  
00017   // starting secondary and z locations
00018   float secondaryStep, zStep;  
00019   // step size in secondary and z directions per unit step in 
00020   //primary direction
00021   short resModelCodeR;  
00022   // resolution model code (index) for r-direction
00023   short resModelCodeZ;   
00024   // resolution model function code (index) for z-direction.
00025   float rand;                  
00026   // randoms component
00027   float norm;                 
00028   // detector normalization
00029   float atten;                   
00030   // attenuation, filled in on first pass
00031   float scatter;               
00032   // scatter, filled in by scatter correction module
00033   float x1,y1,z1,x2,y2,z2;  
00034   // needed by scatter correction: coordinates of 2 motion corrected
00035   // detectors in mm with respect to center of scanner FOV
00036   float yhat;
00037   // forward projections
00038   short numEvents;
00039   // number of observations at LOR (always 1 for list mode)  
00040   int timeStamp;
00041   // number of accumulated time stamps at time of event
00042   // since reference time
00043   float CijNorm;
00044   // normalizes Cij per LOR to the length of the LOR
00045   float sinphi, cosphi;
00046   // determines orientation; used by forward-back projection; 
00047   //absolute value
00048   float costheta;    
00049   // used by fwd-back projection; absolute value      
00050   //  is not structly cos(polar angle) is voxels are not cubic
00051   // The house normalizes this value before returning  the packet
00052   // from calls to getNextEvent()     
00053   float livetime_decay;
00054   // double empty[100];
00055                 
00056   int crystalNumber1, crystalNumber2; //detectors ID number 
00057   float jmid; //mid point of the primary direction
00064   bool operator==(const EventPacket &e2)
00065   {
00066     return (x1==e2.x1 && y1==e2.y1 && z1==e2.z1 &&
00067             x2==e2.x2 && y2==e2.y2 && z2==e2.z2 );
00068   };
00069 
00070 };
